description.value:
School: abjuration;
Level: Sorcerer 8, Wizard 8; Domain: Magic 8;
Components: V, S, M (a diamond of at least 500 gp value, which must be crushed and sprinkled over the targets), F (one 1,000 gp diamond per creature to be granted the protection each subject must carry one such gem for the duration of the spell if a subject loses the gem, the spell ceases to affect him)
Casting Time: 1 standard action
Range: touch
Target: up to one creature touched per four levels
Duration: 10 Minute/Level
Power Points/Spell Points Cost: 15
Saving Throw: Will negates (harmless)
Spell Resistance: yes

Description

The subject gains a +8 resistance bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities (but not against supernatural and extraordinary abilities).

Material Component: A diamond of at least 500 gp value, which must be crushed and sprinkled over the targets.

Focus: One 1,000 gp diamond per creature to be granted the protection. Each subject must carry one such gem for the duration of the spell. If a subject loses the gem, the spell ceases to affect him.
